alert.note: Alert for Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 23 at 6:05AM EDT until April 23 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Ohio, Perry, Morgan, Athens, Washington, Jackson OH, Vinton, Meigs and Gallia Counties. In West Virginia, Wood County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Better protected valley locations could see a period of sub-freezing temperatures heading into this morning and for Monday morning. If you live in a typical cold spot, consider taking additional precautions to protect sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
